title: Google to Invest $40 Billion in New Data Centers in Texas
description: Alphabet Inc.’s Google plans to invest $40 billion in three new Texas data centers, ramping up its footprint as competitors such as OpenAI and Anthropic PBC map out their own multibillion-dollar bets in the state.

title: Oracle Credit Derivatives Jump Amid Rush to Hedge AI Bets
description: The cost of protecting Oracle Corp.’s debt against default is surging by the most since 2021, as jittery investors and lenders rush to hedge against the billions of dollars the software giant is pouring into artificial intelligence.

title: NBA Reviews Timberwolves Owners’ Ties to Kalshi Sports Trading
description: A startup’s entry into prediction market trading is raising fresh questions about the involvement of NBA owners in sports betting.
